UX ResearchPeggy Lai
UI/UX Designer
North York Ontario Canada
Summary
Hi I'm Peggy Lai a super passionate and creative UI/UX designer
with 3 years of experience I absolutely love design and believe
it has the power to make a real impact I'm all about creating
intuitive and visually stunning interfaces that really wow users Let's
collaborate and create something awesome together
Experience
New World Development Company Limited
UI/UX Designer
July 2021  February 2023  1 year 8 months
Hong Kong SAR
 Enhanced enrollment in K Dollar program by 30% through the
implementation of a simplified onboarding process for the NWD’s subsidiaries
app
 Developed a tabletbased restroom feedback system for 600+ users within
the facility involving the creation of a user journey map flowchart system
diagram and comprehensive research
 Utilized Figma to create the interface for Citi Bank point conversion within
the K11 mall app employing a usercentered approach for wireframing and
prototyping
 Oversaw the creation of advanced data visualizations for an administrative
portal utilized by 20+ employees facilitating the monitoring of a blockchain
dataset 1000+ records
 Improved the coherence of the design system library ensuring consistency
across 100+ components and 300+ icons
Tutor Circle
UI/UX Designer
January 2021  June 2021  6 months
  Page 1 of 2    
Hong Kong SAR
 Revamped an illustrative storytelling landing page that resulted in a 40%
increase in conversion rate achieved through the application of A/B Testing
and Google Analytics to assess conversion performance
 Conducted questionnaire survey with 50+ tutors through phone interviews
analysed the the merits and pain points of the Tutor Pass through a SWOT
analysis approach
 Enhanced the matching rate of tutors holding the Tutor Pass by 60%
ensuring that they were connected with students within 2 weeks
 Lead the subscription of the Tutor Pass service by 1000+ tutors enhancing
their potential for student matching
Tech Vision System Ltd
Graphic Designer Internship
July 2019  December 2019  6 months
Hong Kong SAR
 Enhanced user exploration through the redesign of the website and site map
using Adobe XD
 Created a compelling marketing booklet featuring 14 project showcases
aimed at effectively reaching the target audience

Contact
www.linkedin.com/in/peggylaiyk
(LinkedIn)
peggylai.webflow.io  (Portfolio)
Top Skills
Usability Testing
User Experience Design (UED)
UX ResearchPeggy Lai
UI/UX Designer
North York, Ontario, Canada
Summary
Hi, I'm Peggy Lai, a super passionate and creative UI/UX designer
with 3 years of experience. I absolutely love design and believe
it has the power to make a real impact. I'm all about creating
intuitive and visually stunning interfaces that really wow users. Let's
collaborate and create something awesome together!
Experience
New World Development Company Limited
UI/UX Designer
July 2021 - February 2023  (1 year 8 months)
Hong Kong SAR
- Enhanced enrollment in K Dollar program by 30% through the
implementation of a simplified onboarding process for the NWD’s subsidiaries
app.
- Developed a tablet-based restroom feedback system for 600+ users within
the facility, involving the creation of a user journey map, flowchart, system
diagram, and comprehensive research.
- Utilized Figma to create the interface for Citi Bank point conversion within
the K11 mall app, employing a user-centered approach for wireframing and
prototyping.
- Oversaw the creation of advanced data visualizations for an administrative
portal utilized by 20+ employees, facilitating the monitoring of a blockchain
dataset 1000+ records.
- Improved the coherence of the design system library, ensuring consistency
across 100+ components and 300+ icons.
Tutor Circle
UI/UX Designer
January 2021 - June 2021  (6 months)
  Page 1 of 2    
Hong Kong SAR
- Revamped an illustrative storytelling landing page that resulted in a 40%
increase in conversion rate, achieved through the application of A/B Testing
and Google Analytics to assess conversion performance.
- Conducted questionnaire survey with 50+ tutors through phone interviews;
analysed the the merits and pain points of the Tutor Pass through a SWOT
analysis approach.
- Enhanced the matching rate of tutors holding the Tutor Pass by 60%,
ensuring that they were connected with students within 2 weeks.
- Lead the subscription of the Tutor Pass service by 1000+ tutors, enhancing
their potential for student matching.
Tech Vision System Ltd.
Graphic Designer Internship
July 2019 - December 2019  (6 months)
Hong Kong SAR
- Enhanced user exploration through the redesign of the website and site map
using Adobe XD.
- Created a compelling marketing booklet featuring 14 project showcases,
aimed at effectively reaching the target audience.
Education
City University of Hong Kong
Bachelor of Science - BS, Creative Media  · (September 2018 - August 2020)
Community College of City University
Associate's degree, Creative and Interactive Media Production  · (September
2016 - August 2018)
